entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as absent, implying that he is an important figure at Hogwarts.

entities.name: dumbledore

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the students, reacting to the food with longing.

relationships.description: Dumbledore rises to greet all the students.
Ron reacts to the food with longing.
